queue-admin
***********


Description
===========

Use the Queue CLI to produce and consume messages, create queues, and
manage related items. For more information, see Queue.


Available Commands
==================

* queue

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * purge

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log

  * list
